title: How to Play Madden 07 on the Xbox 360 Better

steps.headline: Throw on second and third unless you get the first running.
Try throwing deep down field in the second half.
When you throw look for your primary target first.

text: Turn on console.  Change difficulty setting to All-MADDEN.  Change offensive playbook to: PASS-BALANCED.  Change defensive playbook to: COVER 2.  Always kick the ball off.  Run on first down.  Throw on second and third unless you get the first running.  Periodically switch running backs.  Try throwing deep down field in the second half.  When you throw look for your primary target first.
